as long as enchanted permanent is basecolor or basecolor it has at the beginning of your upkeep sacrifice this permanent unless you pay its mana cost
at the beginning of your upkeep each opponent draws a card

at the beginning of your upkeep sacrifice cardname unless you pay specialmana specialmana

at the beginning of your upkeep if you control a basecolor or basecolor permanent cardname deals n damage to target creature if you control a basecolor permanent and a basecolor permanent cardname deals n damage instead

at the beginning of your upkeep put a lore counter on cardname then draw a card for each lore counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a treasure counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep put a plus n plus n counter on enchanted creature if it attacked or blocked since your last upkeep otherwise remove a plus n plus n counter from it
at the beginning of your upkeep put a plus n plus n counter on enchanted creature
at the beginning of your upkeep put a minus n minus n counter on enchanted creature
at the beginning of your upkeep sacrifice cardname unless you pay genericmana specialmana
at the beginning of your upkeep draw a card if you control a creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield otherwise put a plus n plus n counter on a creature you control
at the beginning of your upkeep discard a card at random if you discard a creature card this way return it from your graveyard to the battlefield unless any player pays n life

at the beginning of your upkeep sacrifice cardname unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand
at the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep that player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker if the player can't they lose n life
at the beginning of your upkeep destroy target creature with a minus n minus n counter on it
at the beginning of your upkeep sacrifice cardname unless you pay n life
at the beginning of your upkeep you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield that creature gains haste until end of turn exile it at the beginning of the next end step
at the beginning of your upkeep choose one
at the beginning of your upkeep create a n n colorless eldrazi scion creature token it has sacrifice this creature add specialmana
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a fungus counter on target nontoken creature
at the beginning of your upkeep target opponent discards a card for each shrine you control
at the beginning of your upkeep destroy the creature with the least power it can't be regenerated if two or more creatures are tied for least power you choose one of them
at the beginning of your upkeep create a token that's a copy of enchanted artifact then if you control eight or more artifacts with the same name as one another you win the game
at the beginning of your upkeep exile a card from your graveyard

at the beginning of your upkeep each player discards a card each opponent who discarded a card that shares a card type with the card you discarded loses n life players reveal the discarded cards simultaneously

at the beginning of your upkeep put a rust counter on each artifact target opponent controls then destroy each artifact with mana value less than or equal to the number of rust counters on it artifacts destroyed this way can't be regenerated

at the beginning of your end step sacrifice a land and discard your hand
at the beginning of your upkeep draw a card for each shrine you control
